You	will	probably	find	that	you	are	more	hungry	than	
normal,	but	you	don’t	need	to	‘eat	for	two’	–	even	if	
you are expecting twins or triplets. Have breakfast 
every	day	–	this	will	help	you	to	avoid	snacking	on	
foods that are high in fat and sugar.
